title: Advent's Contextual Affordance of Hope
description:
Our culture will tell you that "normal" life is easy, beautiful and most of all FUN! If you're not enjoying the kind of life you see on commercials you're obviously doing it wrong. This is a lie. Most life gurus will offer technical fixes, but all technical fixes have a short shelf life. 

James offers advice that leverages worldview assumptions. Patience, long-suffering borrows from future promise. Advent is when we learn to wait and suffer in hope.
